title: "Unable to connect to Server" screwing up ranked game
body:
So, I just started a ranked game - entered the game and suddenly couldn't move anymore getting a couldn't connect to the server message.
I restarted the client - could move a few steps even same issue.
I restarted my computer - same issue.

As you can see by me typing a post here my internet is working completely fine (also for spotify, steam and other games)
but after a few moments ingame i suddenly lose connection to the server.
Now I not only lose LP but also get a leaver buster... I havent purposely left one in over 8k games...

Win 10
i7 4790k
GTX 970 G1


EDIT: Managed to reconnect and play for more than 40 seconds - but our toplaner had the same issue.

replies.body: Sounds like your network is just having a really hard time keeping its connection with our servers for some strange reason. Let's take a look at what your connection looked like after it left your network by using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan those network logs. Post a screenshot of what it shows here so I can go over it with you!

1.) For some logs it says that there are no logs O.o
2.) https://imgur.com/a/ytScP The pictures
3.) The logs http://www22.zippyshare.com/v/UuyWmdgU/file.html
4.) Also while it does say 400ms ping it was never displayed in my client (Most likely the situation where everything just stood still, but I was still able to move my curser. My ping was displayed as 22ms then though)
